Metadata.Title: BCR 30 - Yeet Yeet Yates
Metadata.Description: Dear Agents,welcome to BCR 30!I'm just remembering how everything started with BCR out of a snap idea and now we have some solid returning players and a base of really astonishing runs so far!This contract now includes a sixth target, Franco Rios, to be eliminated with a sniper rifle while wearing the Llama Unique Corvo Black outfit (a tuxedo with blue flat cap, sunglasses, and white sneakers, obtained by subduing Corvo Black).Not much to say, just have fun!Cheers and much love,Bbbbbbbuuuurgers
